name: VR Air Combat War
description:
Become the lord of the skies and fight with the F18 aircraft jet and defeat your enemies and opponents ,Destroy Aircraft carriers and try to last as long as possible

Features :
- Fight with your friend against the air attack
- More than 10+ missions in different areas such as aircraft carriers
- Competent performance of the game and great graphics
- Easy realistic and smooth controls
- High quality environment and realistic AI
-Exciting Cinematic effects!
